# **Contact Investor Relations**

![](/wp-content/uploads/product-page-divider-red-v2.png)

## For questions related to shareholder register

Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Limited 17M Floor, Hopewell Centre 183 Queen’s Road East Wan Chai, Hong Kong Customer Service Hotline: +852 2862-8555 Email: hkinfo@computershare.com.hk

## For inquiries from institutional investors and analysts

Tony Wang Phone: +852 3899-6653 Email: investors@nexteer.com

## For corporate governance and formal notices

Company Secretary 1272 Doris Road Auburn Hills, MI United States 48326 Email: company.secretary@nexteer.com

# **Email Sign-Up**

![](/wp-content/uploads/product-page-divider-red-v2.png)

Sign up for updates from Nexteer’s investor relations team.

Fields marked with an * are required

Company *

Name *

Email Address *

If you are a human seeing this field, please leave it empty.

# **Analyst Coverage**

![](/wp-content/uploads/product-page-divider-red-v2.png)

The following sell-side analysts cover Nexteer on a regular basis.

BOC International / Jia Lou 

BofA Securities / Jessie Lo 

Citi / Beatrice Lam 

CICC / Xue Deng
